title: Why I Left Rust
dot: digraph Rust_Resignation{node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10]; subgraph cluster_timeline{label="Timeline of Events";style=dashed;color=lightgrey; n1[label="1. title: The Gemini protocol seen by this HTTP client person
dot:
digraph GeminiProtocol{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=rounded, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];subgraph cluster_Overview{label="Gemini Protocol Overview";style=rounded;color=lightblue;"Gemini Protocol"[shape=ellipse, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontcolor=black];"Motivations for Existence"[label="Motivations for Existence
- Counter Surveillance
- Reduced Complexity
- Form over Content"];"Specification Details"[label="Specification Details
- Single short-page spec
- Living Document"];"Gemini Protocol"->"Motivations for Existence";"Gemini Protocol"->"Specification Details";}subgraph cluster_TechnicalDetails{label="Technical Details";style=rounded;color=lightgreen;"Counter Surveillance"[label="Counter Surveillance
- No cookies, headers, or auth
- TLS client certificates"];"Reduce Complexity"[label="Reduce Complexity
- Limited features
- Similar to Gopher"];"Short-lived Connections"[label="Short-lived Connections
- No connection reuse
- Performance and energy implications"];"GET-only Requests"[label="GET-only Requests
- No POST/PUT
- Size-limited URLs"];"UTF-8 URL Encoding"[label="UTF-8 URL Encoding
- Conversion challenges
- 1024-byte limit"];"TOFU Certificates"[label="TOFU Certificates
- Trust on first use
- Scaling and security issues"];"Proxying Challenges"[label="Proxying Challenges
- Security and TLS complexities"];"Counter Surveillance"->"Reduce Complexity";"Reduce Complexity"->"Short-lived Connections";"Short-lived Connections"->"GET-only Requests";"GET-only Requests"->"UTF-8 URL Encoding";"UTF-8 URL Encoding"->"TOFU Certificates";"TOFU Certificates"->"Proxying Challenges";}subgraph cluster_Comparison{label="Comparison and Observations";style=rounded;color=lightcoral;"Gopher Revival"[label="Gopher Revival
- Similar to HTTP/0.9
- Small text documents"];"Form vs Content"[label="Form vs Content
- Simplicity over visuals"];"Performance Trade-offs"[label="Performance Trade-offs
- Slower than HTTP
- High latency"]; "Gopher Revival"->"Form vs Content";"Form vs Content"->"Performance Trade-offs";}subgraph cluster_Suggestions{label="Suggestions for Improvement";style=rounded;color=lightgoldenrod1;"Protocol Split"[label="Split Spec
- Protocol, URL, Media type"];"Origin-based Certs"[label="Origin-based Certificates
- Improve security"];"Drop TOFU"[label="Drop TOFU
- Too weak for scaling"];"Clarify Proxying"[label="Clarify Proxying
- Define TLS/secure handling"];"Connection Reuse"[label="Connection Reuse
- Introduce chunks"];"Protocol Split"->"Origin-based Certs";"Origin-based Certs"->"Drop TOFU";"Drop TOFU"->"Clarify Proxying";"Clarify Proxying"->"Connection Reuse";}"Gemini Protocol"->"Counter Surveillance"[lhead=cluster_TechnicalDetails];"Specification Details"->"Gopher Revival"[lhead=cluster_Comparison];"Performance Trade-offs"->"Protocol Split"[lhead=cluster_Suggestions];}
